      • connect

        public void connect()
        This method is called when the receiver has to connect. It can't be started if init(..) hasn't been called beforehand.
        Specified by:
        connect in class AbstractReceiver

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method stops the Kafka receiver, if its status is ConnectionStatus.CONNECTED

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Receiver
        The implementation should return its name here, by which it can be identified. This name will be used as value in the CommunicationConfiguration via the Key "njams.sdk.communication"
        Returns:
        the name of this Receiver: "KAFKA"
